dc_description_s: Covers also a portion of Layfayette.  Shows names of streets, number of municipalities, drainage, and other points of interest.  North oriented to the right.  Includes list of references.  Removed from: Williams, Wellington. Appleton's southern and western travellers' guide. New York: D. Appleton & Co., 1850.|18 x 20 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:31,680|City Maps
